goal.en: This course covers major topics in linear algebra and vector calculus. It aims to prepare students with basic mathematical tools for studying professional courses in scientific and engineering fields.
goal.ch: 建立學生工程應用數學技能及數學工具使用能力。

content.en:
Linear Algebra
(a) Matrix Operations ＆ Linear Systems (chap. 7)
(b) Matrix Eigenvalue Problems (chap. 8)
Vector Calculus
(a) Vector Differential Calculus (chap. 9)
(b) Vector Integral Calculus (chap. 10)
content.ch:
Linear Algebra (線性代數)
(a) Matrix Operations ＆ Linear Systems (chap. 7)
(b) Matrix Eigenvalue Problems (chap. 8)
Vector Calculus (向量微積分)
(a) Vector Differential Calculus (chap. 9)
(b) Vector Integral Calculus (chap. 10)

textbook.en: E. Kreyszig, Advanced Engineering Mathematics, 10th edition update, Wiley (2018).
textbook.ch: E. Kreyszig, Advanced Engineering Mathematics, 10th edition update, Wiley (2018).

grading.en: Homework ＆ Quizzes (30％), Midterm Exam (35％), Final Exam (35％)
grading.ch: Homework ＆ Quizzes (30％), Midterm Exam (35％), Final Exam (35％)
